name: analysis_time
description: Timestamp when the optimization analysis was performed

name: high_priority_optimizations
description: Number of high priority optimization opportunities (score > 70)

name: medium_priority_optimizations
description: Number of medium priority optimization opportunities (score 40-70)

name: low_priority_optimizations
description: Number of low priority optimization opportunities (score < 40)

name: avg_optimization_score
description: Average optimization score across all resources

name: idle_compute_count
description: Number of idle compute instances identified

name: unattached_storage_count
description: Number of unattached storage resources identified

name: optimization_category
description: Primary optimization category for this analysis run

name: analysis_version
description: Version of the analysis algorithm used

name: data_freshness_hours
description: Hours since the asset data was last updated
